document.full_text: the long-awaited new play by tony kushner is a densely textured portrait of a brooklyn family losing its (strictly secular) religion.
document.title: theater review | 'the intelligent homosexual's guide to capitalism and socialism with a key to the scriptures': debating dialectics and dad's suicide plan
